questions.question: 1. According to Archard’s wear equation, more the hardness of material

answers.c: Wear rate doesn’t depend on the hardness

questions.question: 2. The effect of load on wear rate is primarily influenced by:
3. At high loads, the dominant wear mechanism in materials is often:
4. In the context of wear, the relationship between wear coefficient and wear rate can be described as:

answers.a: Higher wear coefficient corresponds to higher wear rate
answers.b: Higher wear coefficient corresponds to lower wear rate
answers.c: Wear coefficient and wear rate are independent of each other
answers.d: The relationship between wear coefficient and wear rate depends on the material properties

questions.question: 5. How does increasing the applied load affect the lubrication film thickness in an elastohydrodynamic lubricated contact?

answers.c: Has no effect on the lubrication film thickness
